campaignPreset.title: 3 - Arcade Mode Preset
campaignPreset.description:
This preset is a stripped-down version of the "Veteran Experience" preset, designed for players who just want to blow stuff up.

Most options remain enabled, but the simulation and roleplay focused settings have been disabled.

This preset is recommended for veteran players who don't care about personnel relationships, prisoners, or the other simulation-style aspects of MekHQ.

Differences from Veteran Preset

  • No maintenance and easier repairs.
  • Easier and quicker procurement.
  • Planetary Acquisitions disabled.
  • All simulation settings, disabled.
  • All roleplay skills, attributes, and traits, disabled.
  • Easier healing.
  • No prisoner management.
  • No employee turnover.
  • Fatigue disabled.
  • Gray Monday effects disabled.
  • Taxes disabled.
  • Instant unit purchase deliveries.
  • Higher scenario difficulty.
  • Mapless StratCon.
